play_store_listing.full_description:

IELTS GenAI Prep is the world's first AI-powered IELTS assessment platform featuring revolutionary TrueScore¬Æ Writing Assessment and ClearScore¬Æ Speaking Assessment technologies.

‚ú® KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ AI-Powered Assessment: Authentic IELTS band scoring with detailed feedback

üìù WRITING ASSESSMENTS:

üé§ SPEAKING ASSESSMENTS:
‚Ä¢ Academic & General Training Speaking

üîÑ SEAMLESS CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE:

üõ°Ô∏è PRIVACY & SECURITY:

other_in_app_messages.purpose: Writing samples for AI assessment and feedback

voice_or_sound_recordings.purpose: Speaking assessment with Maya AI examiner - processed immediately and not stored permanently

app_interactions.purpose: Analytics to improve app functionality and user experience

data_safety.data_sharing: No user data is shared with third parties
data_safety.data_retention: User account data retained until account deletion requested. Voice recordings processed immediately for assessment and not stored. Writing samples retained for assessment history and progress tracking.

user_generated_content.type: Writing samples and voice recordings for assessment
user_generated_content.reporting: Users can report inappropriate content through app settings

internal_testing.testing_instructions: Test mobile-first workflow: 1) Create account, 2) Purchase assessment, 3) Complete assessment, 4) Login to www.ieltsaiprep.com with same credentials

alpha_testing.description: Closed alpha testing with invited users
alpha_testing.testing_focus: Mobile-first authentication workflow and AI assessment accuracy

beta_testing.description: Open beta testing for public feedback
beta_testing.testing_focus: Cross-platform functionality and user experience optimization

release_management.rollout_monitoring: Monitor crash rates, ANR rates, and user reviews during staged rollout
